(Simplified: 诩)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 羽 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 羽 [ yǔ ] feather, plume; wings
①誇耀，說大話：自詡。誇詡。
②(詡詡)同“栩栩”。
③普遍：“德發揚，詡萬物”。
(Simplified: 诩)

詡字的基本解释

詡
xǔ
见“诩”。

詡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǔ］
［《廣韻》況羽切，上麌，曉。］
“诩1”的繁体字。
(1)出言敏捷而气壮。
(2)普及；遍及。
(3)夸大；夸耀。
(4)和融。
(5)通“嫵”。美好貌。

詡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詡； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1156第19
【唐韻】况羽切【集韻】【韻會】火羽切，?訏上聲。【說文】大言也。【玉篇】人語也。【廣韻】和也，普也，遍也，大也。【禮·禮器】德發揚，詡萬物。【疏】言王者撫有四海，宜發揚其德，普遍萬物也。【前漢·揚雄傳】尚泰奢，麗誇詡。【註】詡，大也。　又【廣韻】敏而有勇也。【禮·少儀】會同主詡。【註】詡，謂敏而有勇。　又辭氣明盛貌。　又人名。【前漢·平帝紀】沛郡太守石詡。　【說文】本作?。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xǔ]
["Guang Yun" Kuang Yu cuts, Shang Chu, Xiao. ]
"诩1" in traditional characters.
(1) Speak quickly and boldly.
(2) Popularization; all over.
(3) Exaggerate; boast.
(4) He Rong.
(5) Through "Wu". Good looking.

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　诩; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1156 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Kuang Yu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fire feather cut, sounded. [Speaking] It's a big talk. 【Jade articles】Human language also. [Guang Yun] He Ye, Pu Ye, Bian Ye, Da Ye. 【Ritual·Ritual Vessel】Promote virtue and enlighten all things. 【Sparse】The king of words caress the world, and it is advisable to carry forward his virtues, and everything is universal. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Shang Tai luxury, Li praised. [Note] Shun, big too.　[Guang Yun] Mind and courageous. 【Rite·Shaoyi】Counsel with the Lord. [Note] Xun means being sensitive and courageous.　Resignation and vigorous appearance.　Another name. [Former Han·Pingdi Ji] Shi Xu, the prefect of Peijun.　【Said the text】This work?.
